scripts.build:chrome-extension: rm -rf dist && parcel build chrome-extension/index.html chrome-extension/scripts/**/** chrome-extension/styles/**/** && cp chrome-extension/manifest.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf .cache && yarn install
scripts.deploy:chrome-extension: rm -rf dist && parcel build --public-url=https://azigler.github.io/reactory/example chrome-extension/index.html chrome-extension/scripts/**/** chrome-extension/styles/**/** && cp chrome-extension/manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp -r dist ../deploy/example
